channel.title: Anyone any ideas about removin keylogger!
channel.description: K i found a keylogger programme on a friends pc and i tried remove it by uninstall but it is password protected.. so i went to the site that owns the programme and downloaded it and did a new install so the password would be reset, but now when i try uninstall it says the programme is in use so i am stuck... I dont wanna be 1 to have wipe and reinstall all stuff on his pc lol :confused: :confused:

item.title: Anyone any ideas about removin keylogger!

item.description:
@dannytuite wrote:

another way of removin is install ur own version and then uninstallin lol

item.title: Anyone any ideas about removin keylogger!
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Lemme take a wild guess… Ardamax? If it is, just find a weird folder in “My Computer” like “Funny”, or “Silly”. If its not there, go into my programs like Arr0w said and delete it form there.
